needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Prosciutto is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Goat cheese is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text: Figs and goat cheese are among the secret ingredients you'll find in this essay, which argues that startups offer a more natural way of working than large corporations, where the constraint of working for a virtual single person within a large group is stifling.
